mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SCHEDULE ( SCHEDULE_NO, SCHEDULE_WRITER, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, SELECT_DATE, MAX_INCOUNT, COUNT, PLACE, PLACE_LAT, PLACE_LON, PLACE_ADDR ) VALUES ( SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL, #{scheduleWriter}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, SYSDATE, #{selectDate}, #{count}, #{maxIncount}, #{place}, #{placeLat}, #{placeLon}, #{placeAddr} )
